issues: Missing key statistics (graduation rate, job placement, salaries)
Missing employer partner logos and hiring information

issues: What you offer not immediately clear
Next steps not clear for visitors
recommendations: Clearly state who you help on homepage
Make it obvious how visitors can start
Simplify navigation - reduce clicks to key info
Add strong, visible CTAs throughout site
Improve alt text, contrast, keyboard navigation
